# Maestro

> AI company building tools that amplify human expertise.

Maestro builds AI-powered products across research infrastructure, behavioral economics, creative automation, and productivity. Based in Singapore, globally delivered. Website at maestro.onl.

## Flagship Product

### RA Suite
Professional research infrastructure for quantitative research. Trusted by 50+ research labs worldwide.

Three integrated services:
- **RA Data**: Turn messy public data sources into paper-ready datasets. Automated cleaning, merging, and visualization pipelines. Supports Stata, R, Python, complex merges, regression output, GIS and spatial analysis, multi-source integration, and replication package audits.
- **RA Website**: Research platforms, experiment interfaces, and lab management systems built for academic workflows. Supports oTree and Qualtrics integration, lab CMS and dashboards, participant management, multi-language support, and interactive data visualization.
- **RA Paper**: Collaborative LaTeX editing with real-time compilation, AI proofreading, Git integration, journal-ready templates, reference management, and figure control.

Stats: 50+ labs supported, 2M+ lines delivered, 100% replication rate.
- URL: https://ra.maestro.onl

## Consumer Products

### Econ
AI-powered behavioral economics experiment platform. Describe experiments in plain language, get fully functional participant-ready websites.
- URL: https://econ.maestro.onl

### PrintPic
Professional passport photo and portrait editing suite. Perfect ID photos in seconds, with automated compliance for 195+ countries.
- URL: https://printpic.maestro.onl

### Kairos
Personal assistant for the right moment. Intelligent agent calendar system that plans and executes tasks through natural language.
- URL: https://kairos.maestro.onl

### Growth Foundry
Growth marketing content platform. Data-driven articles on customer acquisition, retention, SEO, and creator economy strategies.
- URL: https://growth.maestro.onl

### Layout
Creator content toolkit. Convert Markdown to WeChat-ready HTML with multiple themes, auto-save, and inline styling.
- URL: https://layout.maestro.onl

### Rehearse
Multimodal practice and presentation rehearsal platform. Record, review, and refine talks with AI-powered feedback.
- URL: https://rehearse.maestro.onl

## Enterprise Services

- Custom AI Solutions: end-to-end AI product development, requirements analysis, ML integration, full-stack development, deployment and support.
- AI Tools and Integration: workflow automation, data pipelines, API integration, analytics dashboards.
- AI Training and Upskilling: hands-on workshops, AI literacy programs, custom curriculum, certification support.

- Website: https://maestro.onl
